label: We Wish You a Festive Holiday
description: These books will help you get ready for the holidays. You'll find ideas for decor, crafts, food, and entertainment.

list.label: Batch cocktails : make-ahead pitcher drinks for every occasion
Candy aisle crafts : create fun projects with supermarket sweets
Christmas at home : holiday decorating, crafts, recipes
Christmas gifts from the kitchen
The cocktail workshop : an essential guide to classic drinks and how to make them your own
Cookie craft Christmas : dozens of decorating ideas for a sweet holiday
The Farm Chicks Christmas : merry ideas for the holidays
Fast & festive meals for the Jewish holidays : complete menus, rituals, and party-planning ideas for every holiday of the year
The garden in winter
Holiday crafting and baking with kids : gifts, sweets, and treats for the whole family!
Holiday with Matthew Mead
The LEGO Christmas ornaments book : 15 designs to spread holiday cheer
Martha's entertaining
Perfect party food : all the recipes and tips you'll ever need for stress-free entertaining from the diva of do-ahead
Quick & clever Christmas cards : 100 fast & festive cards & tags
Real simple celebrations
Roast figs, sugar snow : winter food to warm the soul
Soulful baker : from highly creative fruit tarts and pies to chocolate, desserts and weekend brunch
The sweet book of candy making : from the simple to the spectacular-how to make caramels, fudge, hard candy, fondant, toffee, and more!
Sweeter off the vine : fruit desserts for every season
Wonders of the winter landscape : shrubs and trees to brighten the cold-weather garden
